author: Andy Pearson
method: Pour the Tequila, Cointreau and lime juice into a cocktail shaker. Add a handful of ice cubes and shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds. Strain into a Martini glass with half the rim damped with water, then dipped in salt. Add a lime wedge on the rim by way of garnish.
ingredients: 35ml/1¼fl oz Reposado Tequila,  20ml/¾fl oz Cointreau,  35ml/1¼fl oz fresh lime juice,  handful ice cubes,  lime wedge, to garnish
